name: Deathcraft
description:
You take the role of a man trying to survive and combating robots. Defeat the enemies that invade and try staying alive!

Keybinds that will help you out:

  • WASD: Move around
  • Left Mouse Button: Shoot / Build
  • E: Open and Close the Workbench

> Get close to the workbench in order to build sentry turrets and barricades.
> Items are a little hard to visualize, make sure to collect rewards from dead enemies.

You can access credits HERE.

If your feel like you want to contribute more, please create a thread here so we can discuss about it. 

Known Issue: enemies may stop spawning on submitted game, build with the hot fix => https://drive.google.com/file/d/1RFac6LbKy4kZyG3tSEPtsO7yAkIWJRIf/view?usp=shari.

Enjoy!
